1.title: Hastings

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Award winning children's author Sally Gardner is looking to swap the noise of city life for the peace of the sea, as she searches for her fantasy home in Hastings.

2.title: North Devon

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot:

3.title: North Cornwall

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Aussie Craig grew up by the Ocean, and wants to return to his roots by the sea with wife Jo - so they're looking for a home and to start a holiday business in the UK's surf capital, North Cornwall.

4.title: North Norfolk

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Photographer Alison has spent the last 18 years living in California, but nothing compares to the rugged charm of the Norfolk coast where she is looking to find her dream home by the sea.

11.title: Isle of Man

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Motorbike mad couple Caroline and Paul discovered their dream coastal location while on a recent trip to the Isle of Man for the TT motorbike race. Now they plan on making the island their home.

12.title: South Devon

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Newly married couple Peter and Anne plan to start their new life together in their favourite location, the South Devon seaside, where they have always dreamed of living.

13.title: Snowdonia Coast

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: B&B hosts Kay and Andy are looking to upscale their hospitality business by setting up a larger and grander version on the heritage coast of Snowdonia.

14.title: Broadstairs

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: For London couple Amy and Dick, it's time to get out of the city and upgrade to the quaint coastal town of Broadstairs - for a better quality of life for their young family.

15.title: North Wales

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Warrington couple Jackie and Mark have been holidaying in the Conwy area of North Wales for the past five years, and have a caravan there. Now they are ready to make their weekend getaway their everyday reality, and find a home by the sea.

16.title: The Wirral

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Wirral born and bred, Maureen has lived in rural Yorkshire for the past 20 years. With a huge extended family back in the Wirral, Maureen feels like she's missing out. Maureen's sister, Pauline, has also recently migrated back, and will be helping with her property search.

17.title: Deal

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: After years of living in London, Graphic Designer Emma and PR Consultant Jason want to up sticks and start a new life on the Kent Coast with their two teenage boys.

18.title: East Sussex

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Kathy and Steve, a couple who run a successful B&B in land-locked Malvern, want to move to the East Sussex Coast and open a smaller holiday let business.

19.title: Bournemouth & Poole

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: After decades of being tied to the Midlands for work, David and Janet have decided to take the plunge and fulfil their dream of living on the Dorset coast, on a £625,000 budget.

20.title: Northumberland

episode of.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: A couple who want buy a home-from-home on the Northumberland coast that they can use whenever they need a break, but also with rental potential.

imdb.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea
akas: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (United Kingdom)
plot: This is a series about people looking for a home by the sea. Each episode is usually about a different couple looking in a different place.::Chris Williams
